    A

    AbstractFileReporter - Class in org.revapi.reporter.file
    This class can be used as a base class for reporters that want to write the reports into the files.

    createOutputWriter(OutputStream, AnalysisContext) - Method in class org.revapi.reporter.file.AbstractFileReporter

    D

    doReport(Report) - Method in class org.revapi.reporter.file.AbstractFileReporter
    The report contains differences of at least the configured severity.

    R

    report(Report) - Method in class org.revapi.reporter.file.AbstractFileReporter
    This is the default implementation of the report method that does the initial filtering based on the configured minimum severity and then delegates to doReport(Report) if the reporting should really be performed.
